logs.message:
Parameters: {"nodeType":"nodes-langchain.agent","config":{"text":"{{$json.ticket_content}}","outputType":"output","systemMessage":"You are a customer support ticket analysis assistant. Analyze the provided ticket content and return a JSON response with the following structure:

{
  "urgency": "low|medium|high|critical",
  "sentiment": "positive|neutral|negative",
  "category": "technical|billing|general|complaint",
  "keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2"],
  "recommended_team": "technical|billing|customer_success|escalation"
}

Urgency levels:
- critical: System down, security issues, data loss
- high: Service disruption, payment issues, angry customers
- medium: Feature requests, minor bugs, general inquiries
- low: Documentation questions, feedback, compliments

Team assignment rules:
- technical: Bug reports, API issues, integration problems
- billing: Payment, subscription, invoice questions
- customer_success: Feature requests, onboarding, general support
- escalation: Complaints, refund requests, legal issues

Always respond with valid JSON only."}}
Added node: nodes-base.webhook (Webhook that gracefully handles processing errors)
Added node: nodes-base.code (Transform data structure using JavaScript)
Added node: nodes-langchain.agent (Create an AI agent that can use tools)
Added node: nodes-base.slack (Send a message to Slack channel)
Added node: nodes-base.httpRequest (Examples of modern error handling using onError property)
Added node: nodes-base.switch (Route support tickets to different teams based on keywords and categorization results)

parameters.text: {{$json.ticket_content}}
parameters.systemMessage:
You are a customer support ticket analysis assistant. Analyze the provided ticket content and return a JSON response with the following structure:

{
  "urgency": "low|medium|high|critical",
  "sentiment": "positive|neutral|negative",
  "category": "technical|billing|general|complaint",
  "keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2"],
  "recommended_team": "technical|billing|customer_success|escalation"
}

Urgency levels:
- critical: System down, security issues, data loss
- high: Service disruption, payment issues, angry customers
- medium: Feature requests, minor bugs, general inquiries
- low: Documentation questions, feedback, compliments

Team assignment rules:
- technical: Bug reports, API issues, integration problems
- billing: Payment, subscription, invoice questions
- customer_success: Feature requests, onboarding, general support
- escalation: Complaints, refund requests, legal issues

Always respond with valid JSON only.

workflow.name: Customer Support Ticket Processing with AI Categorization

parameters.text: {{$json.full_text}}
parameters.systemMessage:
You are a customer support ticket categorization AI. Analyze the ticket content and return a JSON object with:
- urgency: 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'critical'
- sentiment: 'positive', 'neutral', 'negative', or 'angry'
- category: 'technical', 'billing', 'general', 'bug_report', or 'feature_request'
- keywords: array of relevant keywords found in the ticket
- team_suggestion: 'technical', 'billing', 'customer_success', or 'product'

Base urgency on words like 'urgent', 'critical', 'broken', 'not working', 'asap', 'immediately'.
Base sentiment on tone and emotional indicators.
Extract keywords that would help with routing.

buildPhases.description: Webhook endpoint receives incoming customer support tickets via HTTP POST requests. Configured with error handling to gracefully process tickets and continue workflow execution.
Transform raw webhook data into structured ticket format and prepare content for AI analysis. Extracts key fields like customer info, ticket content, and creates formatted text for categorization.
AI agent analyzes ticket content to categorize urgency level, sentiment, and suggest appropriate team assignment. Uses natural language processing to extract keywords and determine routing logic.
Routes tickets to different teams based on AI categorization results and predefined rules. Separates technical issues, billing inquiries, critical escalations, and general support requests.

Sends targeted Slack notifications to appropriate teams with priority-based formatting and retry logic. Includes technical team alerts, billing notifications, critical escalations, and general support messages.

Create an AI agent that can use tools
Send a message to Slack channel
Examples of modern error handling using onError property

  "sentiment": "positive|neutral|negative",
  "category": "technical|billing|general|complaint",
  "keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2"],
  "recommended_team": "technical|billing|customer_success|escalation"
}

Urgency levels:
- critical: System down, security issues, data loss
- high: Service disruption, payment issues, angry customers
- medium: Feature requests, minor bugs, general inquiries
- low: Documentation questions, feedback, compliments

Team assignment rules:
- technical: Bug reports, API issues, integration problems
- billing: Payment, subscription, invoice questions
- customer_success: Feature requests, onboarding, general support
- escalation: Complaints, refund requests, legal issues

Always respond with valid JSON only.

workflow.name: Customer Support Ticket Processing with AI Categorization

parameters.text: {{$json.full_text}}
parameters.systemMessage:
You are a customer support ticket categorization AI. Analyze the ticket content and return a JSON object with:
- urgency: 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'critical'
- sentiment: 'positive', 'neutral', 'negative', or 'angry'
- category: 'technical', 'billing', 'general', 'bug_report', or 'feature_request'
- keywords: array of relevant keywords found in the ticket
- team_suggestion: 'technical', 'billing', 'customer_success', or 'product'

Base urgency on words like 'urgent', 'critical', 'broken', 'not working', 'asap', 'immediately'.
Base sentiment on tone and emotional indicators.
Extract keywords that would help with routing.

phases.description: Webhook endpoint receives incoming customer support tickets via HTTP POST requests. Configured with error handling to gracefully process tickets and continue workflow execution.
Transform raw webhook data into structured ticket format and prepare content for AI analysis. Extracts key fields like customer info, ticket content, and creates formatted text for categorization.
AI agent analyzes ticket content to categorize urgency level, sentiment, and suggest appropriate team assignment. Uses natural language processing to extract keywords and determine routing logic.
Routes tickets to different teams based on AI categorization results and predefined rules. Separates technical issues, billing inquiries, critical escalations, and general support requests.

Sends targeted Slack notifications to appropriate teams with priority-based formatting and retry logic. Includes technical team alerts, billing notifications, critical escalations, and general support messages.

state.userPrompt: Create an n8n workflow that receives customer support tickets via webhook, uses an AI agent to categorize the urgency and sentiment, automatically assigns tickets to the right team based on keywords, and sends Slack notifications with different priority levels. Include retry logic and error handling.
